特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景: Intensive English is a four-skills course to develop communication skills by listening, speaking, reading and writing about various biweekly topics. Students will also study essential grammar, phrases and vocabulary for practical communication, while developing study skills to help them further improve their English independently.
授業方法: The class will be held in English as a communicative 4-skills workshop. Active participation is expected from all students.
